title: 75/72. Decreasing the operational readiness of nuclear weapons systems

paragraphs.1: Calls for practical and concrete steps to be taken, unilaterally, bilaterally or multilaterally, to decrease the operational readiness of nuclear weapons systems, with a view to ensuring that all nuclear weapons are removed from high alert status;
paragraphs.2: Looks forward to the issue of the lowering of the operational readiness of nuclear weapons systems being addressed further at the tenth Review Conference of the Parties to the Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons;
paragraphs.3: Urges States to update the General Assembly on progress made in the implementation of the present resolution;
paragraphs.4: Decides to remain seized of the matter.
